description: AA-DEX. A fully decentralized onchain exchange for trading tokens issued on Obyte.

field_descriptions.sell_asset: ID of asset you want to sell (44 characters or base).
field_descriptions.buy_asset: ID of asset you want to buy (44 characters or base).
field_descriptions.expiry_ts: Optional, timestamp defining when the order expires.
field_descriptions.lock: Optional, timestamp defining order cancelation lock. Set 1 for a order which cant be cancelled (except if expires).
field_descriptions.address: Sell order beneficiary address. It is the address which also holds the power to cancel the order is being created.
field_descriptions.id: ID of order as shown on state vars.
field_descriptions.cancel: Command to cancel an opened order. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.trade: Command to match an opened order. Set the value to 1.
